 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָזַר‎</span>]<sub>82</sub> **verb** ==help, succour== (Late Hebrew noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶזְרָה‎</span> ***help***; Phoenician in derivatives and compounds [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>338 f.</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***excuse, exculpate***, also ***aid***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***help***, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עדר‎</span>, rarely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזר‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>338</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>89. 90</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲזָרָ֑נִי‎</span> [[Ps.118.13|Ps 118:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲזָָֽרְךָ‎</span> [[1Chr.12.19|1Chr 12:19]] 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲזָרֻם‎</span> [[1Chr.12.20|1Chr 12:20]], etc., ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲזָרֿ‎</span> [[Isa.50.7|Isa 50:7]]; [[Isa.50.9|Isa 50:9]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְזְרֶךָּ‎</span> [[Isa.44.2|Isa 44:2]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְזֹ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Isa.30.7|Isa 30:7]]; [[Isa.41.6|Isa 41:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעְזְרוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.7|1Kgs 1:7]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַזְרֻנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.175|Ps 119:175]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָזְרֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.109.26|Ps 109:26]]; [[Ps.119.86|Ps 119:86]] + [[Josh.10.4|Josh 10:4]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִזְרֻנִי‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲזֹר‎</span> [[1Chr.22.17|1Chr 22:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲזוֺר‎</span> [[1Chr.18.5|1Chr 18:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעְזֹר‎</span> [[Josh.10.33|Josh 10:33]] + 5 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעְזוֺר‎</span> [[2Chr.25.8|2Chr 25:8]] + [[2Sam.18.3|2Sam 18:3]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲזִיר‎</span> **Hiph\`il**); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעָזְרֵנִי‎</span> [[1Chr.12.17|1Chr 12:17]] + 2 t., etc., ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹזֵר‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.16|1Kgs 20:16]] +, etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָזֻר‎</span> [[Isa.31.3|Isa 31:3]] — ***help***, with accusative of person [[1Kgs.20.16|1Kgs 20:16]]; [[Josh.1.14|Josh 1:14]] + [[2Chr.28.23|2Chr 28:23]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹזְרִים‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53o»§ 53o</sup>, for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְזְרִים‎</span>, apparently **Hiph\`il**; subject false gods); with accusative of location (city) [[Josh.10.33|Josh 10:33]] ([[BDB#D|D]]); especially with suffix person [[Josh.10.4|Josh 10:4]]; [[Josh.10.6|Josh 10:6]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺשִׁיעַ‎</span>; both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Chr.12.18|1Chr 12:18]]; [[1Chr.12.20|1Chr 12:20]]; [[1Chr.12.23|1Chr 12:23]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.17|1Chr 12:17]] v.[[1Chr.12.19|1Chr 12:19]] v.[[1Chr.12.22|1Chr 12:22]]), [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]]; [[Ezra.8.22|Ezra 8:22]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of enemy), [[Ezra.10.15|Ezra 10:15]]; [[Dan.10.13|Dan 10:13]] (subject Michael); subject often God (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), with accusative of person [[Ps.10.14|Ps 10:14]]; [[1Chr.15.26|1Chr 15:26]], usually suffix [[Gen.49.25|Gen 49:25]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.7.12|1Sam 7:12]]; [[Isa.41.10|Isa 41:10]]; [[Isa.41.13|Isa 41:13]]; [[Isa.41.14|Isa 41:14]] + 12 t. + [[2Chr.26.7|2Chr 26:7]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***), [[Ps.37.40|Ps 37:40]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּלֵּט‎</span>), [[Ps.46.6|Ps 46:6]] (suffix of city), [[Ps.109.26|Ps 109:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺשִׁיעַ‎</span>); subject false gods [[Deut.32.8|Deut 32:8]]; [[2Chr.28.23|2Chr 28:23]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person [[2Sam.8.5|2Sam 8:5]] + [[1Chr.18.5|1Chr 18:5]] + 4 t. + [[2Sam.18.3|2Sam 18:3]] (read [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲזוֺר‎</span>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעֹזֵר‎</span> ? compare [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.50.7|Isa 50:7]]; [[Isa.50.9|Isa 50:9]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> person [[1Chr.12.22|1Chr 12:22]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.21|1Chr 12:21]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי‎</span> person (construction praegn.) [[1Kgs.1.7|1Kgs 1:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person against whom [[2Chr.20.23|2Chr 20:23]] (+ infinitive); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין ֗֗֗ לְ‎</span>, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[2Chr.14.10|2Chr 14:10]] absolute [[Isa.30.7|Isa 30:7]]; [[2Chr.26.13|2Chr 26:13]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***), [[2Chr.28.16|2Chr 28:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרָעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Zech.1.15|Zech 1:15]] ***they helped, with evil result***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject, [[2Chr.25.8|2Chr 25:8]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְשִׁיל‎</span>); also participle with suffix [[Ezek.30.8|Ezek 30:8]] + 3 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person [[2Kgs.14.26|2Kgs 14:26]] + 5 t., of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.30.11|Ps 30:11]]; [[Ps.54.6|Ps 54:6]] absolute [[Isa.31.3|Isa 31:3]]; [[Isa.63.5|Isa 63:5]]; [[Jer.47.4|Jer 47:4]]; [[Ps.22.12|Ps 22:12]]; [[Ps.107.12|Ps 107:12]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹזְרֵי הַמִּלְחָמָה‎</span> [[1Chr.12.1|1Chr 12:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹזְרֵי רָ֑הַב‎</span> [[Job.9.13|Job 9:13]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַהַב‎</span>); Participle ***passive*** absolute as substantive ***he who is helped*** [[Isa.31.3|Isa 31:3]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנֶעֱזָרְ֑תִּי‎</span> [[Ps.28.7|Ps 28:7]] ***I am helped*** (that is, by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּעָֽזְרוּ‎</span> [[1Chr.5.20|1Chr 5:20]] (that is, ***id.***; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***, with noun cognate <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעָֽזְרוּ עֵזֶר מְעָט‎</span> [[Dan.11.34|Dan 11:34]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפְלִיא לְהֵעָזֵר‎</span> [[2Chr.26.15|2Chr 26:15]] ***he was wonderfully helped*** (literally ***made wonderful to be helped***). **Hiph\`il** dubious: ***Infinitive construct*** [[2Sam.18.3|2Sam 18:3]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְזְרִים‎</span> [[2Chr.28.23|2Chr 28:23]], see **Qal.**
